page.title: 20School and W.I. Co-operation
page.content: {Shalford School}was originally allocated a block for the Domesday Project which included{Panfield,}which is part of our catchment area but the {School}and{Shalford Village}were not included so when we heard that the {W.I.}were interested but had no computer access we asked them to join us and help to cover two blocks. This proved very successful. It solved a number of problems in that we could then transport children in small groups as the ladies mostly had cars and we could provide sufficient numbers of adults to accompany groups. The ladies were very interested in the visits which gave opportunities to find out so much about our local area and to see what the children were doing. The children benefitted from meeting and talking to the ladies and to people we met on our many visits.
